name: GALAXY SHOOTER (ArbiterGames)
description:
Title: GALAXY SHOOTER

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Defeat hordes of enemies in this futuristic space shooter! 

Instructions:

WASD Keys: Navigate your spaceship

Space Bar: Shoot

Fly towards: "Level 2" to get to the second level.

Game Design Team

OKAN, Fatih  – Game Designer
